title: Amanda Holden reckons Carol Vorderman has a ‘bum you can really bite’
text:
Amanda Holden and Carol Vorderman both have great bums, fact (Picture: Getty)

Amanda Holden has joked that she would like to ‘bite’ Carol Vorderman’s bum.

The two female entertainers have both won the infamous Rear of the Year award, with Amanda winning in 2019, beating Carol who won in 2011 and again in 2014, making her the first woman to win twice.

But now Amanda has joked that she still can’t believe she’d beaten Carol – but that her husband was ‘thrilled’.

‘Yes — gosh — I beat Carol Vorderman. She’s won it quite a lot. She’s got a bum you can really bite,’ she said.

‘And there is a physical award. My husband is thrilled!’

Carol was the first woman to win twice (Picture: Backgrid)

But despite the mention of the National Television Award, Amanda added: ‘I would take winning Rear of the Year over an NTA every time.’

Classic Amanda.

Amanda is known for laughing about her own assets (Picture: Splash)

Amanda is known for laughing about her own assets, and on Friday she even managed to laugh off an awkward fashion mishap as she headed out in London.

The Britain’s Got Talent judge looked seriously chic as she left the Heart Radio studios, following her breakfast show opting for a mint green jumper for the day, paired with a bottle green, pleated skirt.

Clearly still in holiday mode, the 48-year-old completed the look with sunglasses and off-white trainers but without her coat, Amanda’s body was clearly feeling the plummeting temperatures.
